postBootScript: git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/host-key-tools.git /root/host-key-tools; cd /root/host-key-tools/hostkey-py/; python setup.py install; cp /root/host-key-tools/host-key-tools.service /usr/lib/systemd/system; sed -i 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/bin\/hostkeyd start -c https:\/\/18.221.238.74:8111\/ -s WORKFLOW -r WORKFLOWread -w WORKFLOWwrite -i NODENAME/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service; systemctl enable host-key-tools.service ; service host-key-tools.service start;echo 'SUBMIT via IPADDR' >> /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/route-eth1;echo 'SUBNET via IPADDR' >> /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/route-eth1;/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifup-routes eth1;wget http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/worker.sh -O /root/worker.sh;sed -i 's/NETWORK_INTERFACE=/NETWORK_INTERFACE=REPLACEIP/g' /root/worker.sh;sed -i 's/storage/STORAGENODE/g' /root/worker.sh;sh /root/worker.sh
